thumb.title: On the road with Dr. Brian King. Living La Vida Costa Rica with Richard Blank!
thumb.description: Dr Brian King is a traveling comedian, author, and public speaker. This is his podcast.Started in 2012 as a radio segment in San Francisco, Dr Brian King spends a lot of time on the road, meeting interesting people and occasionally interviewing them. In recent years, his partner, tango dancer and model Sarah Bollinger, often serve as his co-host. Dr. Brian King. Cowboy Rock Star Scientist. Just your typical psychologist turned comedian turned family man turned YouTuber! 27 years ago, Richard Blank left Philadelphia on a journey that brought him to Costa Rica where he now owns a successful business and the largest collection of pinball machines in the country. It's a great story, and a terrific podcast that I know you will enjoy. https://youtu.be/qKkdxqm6uochttps://youtu.be/yGy7ZiCgoBshttps://youtu.be/WnSLocoYLdQ
